Hi

I am a software tester with no experience with JUnit however, I think I=
 know my way around HPQC. 

For one of the projects, the development team i=
s using JUnit to prepare test cases, however as a process, I have been aske=
d to find out if JUnit and HPQC are compatible.

I would request any sugges=
tions/pointers/Challenges/best practices which would assist me in understan=
ding the compatibility. 

I also have some questions which I was not able t=
o figure out?

1. Is JUnit a unit testing tool? or is it a testing manageme=
nt tool in which we store test cases and test execution results
2. I have d=
ownload Junit from the http://www.junit.org/, however I have not been able =
to "load" the tool. I am not sure on which file to execute? I am running on=
 Windows XP SP2. 

I understand that these might be newbie questions, howev=
er any pointers you might provide me would be very appericated
